member.name: T:CimTools.v2.Utilities.SpriteUtilities
member.summary:
Utilities for sprite handling. Takes care of atlases and sprites.
Atlases are a large map of many small sprites. Cities handles all individual sprites using a single large atlas, and each sprite has a location on the atlas.

member.name: M:CimTools.v2.Utilities.SpriteUtilities.GetAtlas(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a stored atlas.
member.param: The name of the atlas to return.

member.name: M:CimTools.v2.Utilities.SpriteUtilities.InitialiseAtlas(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new atlas from a texture and a name.
member.param: The full path to the texture.
The name to give the atlas. Used for finding and using later.
member.returns: Whether the atlas was created successfully.

member.name: M:CimTools.v2.Utilities.SpriteUtilities.AddSpriteToAtlas(UnityEngine.Rect,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new sprite using the size of the image inside the atlas.
member.param: The location and size of the sprite within the atlas (in pixels).
The name of the sprite to create
The name of the atlas to add the sprite to.

member.name: M:CimTools.v2.Utilities.SpriteUtilities.FixTransparency(UnityEngine.Texture2D)
member.summary: Copy the values of adjacent pixels to transparent pixels color info, to remove the white border artifact when importing transparent .PNGs.

member.name: M:CimTools.v2.CimToolBase.#ctor(CimTools.v2.CimToolSettings)

member.param: Your mod settings

member.name: T:CimTools.v2.Workshop.Changelog
member.summary:
Used for grabbing change logs from the Steam Workshop. This will automatically get the most recent change log on the page and return it in either a list or a string.
The workshop changelogs must be formatted in a specific way in order for them to be correctly formatted when getting the output from the class. Every change must be within [list][/list] tags with [*] before each item when entering them into the workshop.

member.name: F:CimTools.v2.Workshop.Changelog.m_webClient
member.summary: The web client that accesses the community and downloads the changes

member.name: F:CimTools.v2.Workshop.Changelog.m_changeList
member.summary: A list of changes which is populated upon download.

member.name: F:CimTools.v2.Workshop.Changelog.m_rawChanges
member.summary: A string which contains all changes. Populated upon download.

member.name: F:CimTools.v2.Workshop.Changelog.m_downloadComplete
member.summary: Whether the download is complete or not.

member.name: F:CimTools.v2.Workshop.Changelog.m_downloadInProgress
member.summary: Whether a download is in progress or not.

member.name: F:CimTools.v2.Workshop.Changelog.m_downloadError
member.summary: Whether the download has encountered an error.

member.name: P:CimTools.v2.Workshop.Changelog.DownloadInProgress
member.summary: If downloading Async, this determines whether or not there is an ongoing download.

member.name: P:CimTools.v2.Workshop.Changelog.DownloadComplete
member.summary: If downloading Async, this will return whether the download has completed from that request. If the download fails it will still be false.

member.name: P:CimTools.v2.Workshop.Changelog.DownloadError
member.summary: Whether an error has occured while downloading the most recent changes.

member.name: P:CimTools.v2.Workshop.Changelog.ChangesString
member.summary: A formatted string of change logs. Each change log is separated by \n\n.

member.name: P:CimTools.v2.Workshop.Changelog.ChangesList
member.summary: A list of change logs.

member.name: F:CimTools.v2.Workshop.Changelog.m_colouriseTags
member.summary: Whether or not to replace HTML tags with colours.

member.name: F:CimTools.v2.Workshop.Changelog.m_tagsToColourise
member.summary: A list of tags to replace with colours.

member.name: M:CimTools.v2.Workshop.Changelog.DownloadChangelog
member.summary: Downloads the latest changelog from a workshop item using the ID provided. Please note that this will stop the calling thread while it downloads, but you can guarantee the download will be complete when the thread resumes.

member.name: M:CimTools.v2.Workshop.Changelog.DownloadChangelogAsync
member.summary: Downloads the latest changelog from a workshop item using the ID provided. Please note that while this works on a separate thread, you can't guarantee the download will be complete immediately. You should check for a complete download using m_downloadCompleted before trying to get data from it.

member.name: M:CimTools.v2.Workshop.Changelog.ExtractData(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts data from a HTML page. This will only work on the Steam Workshop due to certain div IDs. You shouldn't need to call this yourself really, and should only be used if you really really need to use it.

member.name: T:CimTools.v2.Panels.UpdatePanel
member.summary: A speech bubble which contains the latest changes to your mod. The bubble can be clicked and expanded to reveal new changes, rather than taking up loads of space.

member.name: F:CimTools.v2.Panels.UpdatePanel.m_changelogDownloader
member.summary:
Set and get a Changelog downloader. By default this uses the default Changelog instance, but you can pass your own through here if you wish to use your own.
Please note that if you are using the default Changelog instance you will need to set it up for your mod, otherwise you'll get no changes.

member.name: F:CimTools.v2.Panels.UpdatePanel.m_updatedTitleMessage
member.summary: The initial message title when an update has been detected.

member.name: F:CimTools.v2.Panels.UpdatePanel.m_updatedContentMessage
member.summary: The initial message content when an update has been detected.

member.name: M:CimTools.v2.Panels.UpdatePanel.Initialise(CimTools.v2.CimToolBase)
member.summary: Automatically initialises the update panel with settings from the tool base.
member.param: Your internally saved CimToolBase

member.name: M:CimTools.v2.Panels.UpdatePanel.SetPositionSpeakyPoint(UnityEngine.Vector2)
member.summary: Sets the position of the panel based on the "speaky point" of the speech bubble it creates
member.param: Position to set the panel to
